on the afternoon of october 25, an accident occurred on highway 1a, passing through long dinh commune, chau thanh district, tien giang.
traffic between two motorbikes caused three casualties according to people who witnessed the accident
the accident recounted that at around 2:40 p.m., a motorbike carrying special money was controlled by a young man waiting with a girl behind.

after falling on the road after the accident, all three injured men were taken to the hospital for emergency treatment. however, on the way to the hospital, the man died.
